content.rendered:
Domestic routes     : 1 piece of baggage not exceeding 25 kgs. (55 lbs.).

International routes: 1 piece of baggage not exceeding 23 kgs. (50 lbs.).

 

For more details visit : http://www.aeromar airlines.com/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Aeromar Airlines Excess Baggage

Aeromar Airlines Hand | Cabin Baggage
